images.desc: This is the door from the Transportation & Safety Building.
This is the end of the hall before the glass walkway.
You will see this when facing the glass walkway.
This is the last door before entering the Graduate Hotel.

instructions: Starting on the second floor of The Transportation and Safety Building, make your way to East-most point on the north side of the building.
There will be a door on your left pictured above connected to a carpeted path (The Washington Ave Parking Ramp will be on your left).
When it stops going straight, to the right is a glass walkway pictured.
Straight ahead through will take you to the second floor of the Graduate Hotel.
